mapper.select: INSERT INTO OTOCHAT (CHATTINGROOMID, SELLERID, BUYERID, CHAT, CHATNUM, CHATTIME) VALUES (#{chattingRoomId}, #{sellerId}, #{buyerId}, #{chat}, #{chatNum}, #{chatTime})
INSERT INTO OTOCHAT (CHATTINGROOMID, BOOKID, SELLERID, BUYERID, CHAT, CHATNUM, CHATTIME) VALUES (#{chattingRoomId}, #{bookId}, #{sellerId}, #{buyerId}, #{chat}, #{chatNum}, #{chatTime})
SELECT CHATTINGROOMID, SELLERID, BUYERID, CHAT, CHATNUM, CHATTIME FROM OTOCHAT WHERE CHATTINGROOMID = #{chattingRoomId}
SELECT CHATTINGROOMID, BOOKID, SELLERID, BUYERID, CHAT, CHATNUM, CHATTIME FROM OTMCHAT WHERE CHATTINGROOMID = #{chattingRoomId}
SELECT DISTINCT CHATTINGROOMID, SELLERID, BUYERID, CHAT, CHATNUM, CHATTIME FROM OTOCHAT WHERE SELLERID = #{userId} OR BUYERID = #{userId}
